description: Two aliens on a rooftop are engaged in the peculiar act of fishing, but their catch is a human dangled from the line as bait. This surreal scene depicts a bizarre reversal of roles, where humans are treated as prey in an absurd cosmic sport. The dangling human is pursued by other figures on the street below, highlighting the chaotic and unexpected nature of the alien's activity. A flying saucer rests on the roof, suggesting this is an extraterrestrial endeavor. The situation is presented with deadpan humor, contrasting the mundane act of fishing with the extraordinary and disturbing reality of alien abduction as a leisure activity.
caption: “Something’s wrong. ... Reel up and check the bait.”
